EmailTemplate.name: Community: Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the WEX Partner Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to the WEX Partner Community!
To get started, go to this URL to enter in a new password: {!Community_Url}
After that, you can access the community from the following URL: https://wexinc.force.com/partners
Feel free to bookmark this link in your browser.
Thanks,
WEX Partner Team
